---
labels: ['module', templates, templates]
description: 'Generator templates for NodeJS development'
---

Official Bit component generator templates for NodeJS. It includes the following templates:

- Entity
- Module
- NodeJS dev environment
- Bit app
- Express app

## Use in your dev environment

Use these templates in your dev environment by composing this component to your custom `bit-env` file:

```ts
import { NodeEnv } from '@bitdev/node.node-env';
import { NodeEnvTemplate, EntityTemplate, NodeModuleTemplate, ExpressAppTemplate } from '@bitdev/node/generator/node-templates';

class MyEnv extends NodeEnv {
  generators() {
    return TemplateList.from([
      NodeEnvTemplate.from(),
      EntityTemplate.from(),
      NodeModuleTemplate.from(),
      ExpressAppTemplate.from(),
    ]);
  }
}
```

## Fork the templates

You can fork these templates to create your own customized NodeJS generator templates:

```
bit fork bitdev.node/generators/node-templates
```

After forking the component, make sure the use the new package name in your [custom dev environment](#use-in-your-dev-environment).
